pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bindings for 'Tabula' PDF Table Extractor Library // Bindings for the 'Tabula' http://tabula.technology/ 'Java' library, which can extract tables from PDF documents. The 'tabulizerjars' package https://github.com/ropensci/tabulizerjars provides versioned 'Java' .jar files, including all dependencies, aligned to releases of 'Tabula'.
